data.title: Catholic Sat
data.meta_description: Posts about Touma Saleh written by Thomas
data.text:
All times are UTC/GMT

Monday 11

12:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 2nd Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of Gathering. Speakers include Br. Alois Löser Prior of the Taizé Community, France and Dr. Maria Voce, the President of Focolare.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

15:00

Live Baabdat, Lebanon. Holy Mass for the closing of the Diocesan process investigation for the Beatification of the Capuchin Martyrs Fr. Leonard Melki and Fr. Touma Saleh, from the Monastery of St. Anthony.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Noursat

17:30

Live from Rome, Italy. Convention of the Rome Diocese, from the Papal Archbasilica of St. John Lateran. Presided by Pope Benedict XVI

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, TV2000, KTO

Tuesday 12

12:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 3rd Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of ‘Communion in Marriage and Family’. Speakers include Archbishop Barry Hickey, Archbishop Emeritus of Perth, Australia and Dr. Carl Anderson, Supreme Knight, Knights of Columbus.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

15:00

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Holy Mass on the 3rd Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, from the Royal Dublin Society Arena. Presided by Andre Cardinal Vingt-Trois, Archbishop of Paris.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

16:00

Live from Gdańsk-Oliwa, Poland. Holy Mass on the occasion of the 25th Anniversary of the visit of Blessed Pope John Paul II to Gdańsk, and the 20th Anniversary of the founding of the Archdiocese of Gdańsk, from the Cathedral Basilica of the Most Holy Trinity. Presided by Tarcisio Cardinal Bertone, Secretary of State of the Vatican, Camerlengo of the Holy Roman Church.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV TRWAM

17:30

Live from Rome, Italy. Convention of the Rome Diocese, from the Papal Archbasilica of St. John Lateran. Presided by Agostino Cardinal Vallini, Vicar General of Rome, Archpriest of the Archbasilica of San Giovanni in Laterano.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace

20:30

Live from Fatima, Portugal. Prayer Vigil and Holy Mass for the June International Pilgrimage. Blessing of the Candles and Rosary in the Chapel of the Apparitions, followed by Candle Light Procession and finally celebration of Holy Mass. Presided by Bishop José Manuel Garcia Cordeiro, Bishop of Bragança-Miranda.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, Canção Nova, K-TV

Wednesday 13

08:00

Live from Fatima, Portugal. Procession, Holy Mass and Blessing of the Sick for the June International Pilgrimage. Presided by Bishop José Manuel Garcia Cordeiro, Bishop of Bragança-Miranda.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Canção Nova

Channels Broadcasting Delayed: Telepace (10:00), K-TV (10:00)

08:30

Papal General Audience

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN, Telepace, TV2000, TRSP, K-TV, TV TRWAM, KTO

Channels Broadcasting Delayed: EWTN (20:00), Canção Nova International (20:00), KTO (13:00, and again at 22:10)

11:30

Live from Wigratzbad, Germany. Holy Mass, Exposition of the Blessed Sacrament, and Blessing of the Sick, from the Seminary of Wigratzbad.

Channels Broadcasting Live: K-TV

12:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 4th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of ‘Priesthood and Ministry in the service of Communion’. Speakers include Archbishop John Michael Miller, Archbishop of Vancouver, Canada, and Noreen Carroll of Foxrock parish, Dublin Ireland.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

14:55

Live from Padua, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of St. Anthony of Padua, followed by the procession of the relics of St. Anthony of Padua, from the Basilica of St. Anthony. Preside by Fr. Gianni Cappelletto, Provincal Minister of the Order of Friars Minor Conventual.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace

15:00

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Holy Mass on the 4th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress and the Feast of St. Anthony of Padua, from the Royal Dublin Society Arena. Presided by Oscar Andrés Cardinal Rodríquez Maradiaga, Archbishop of Tegucigalpa, Honduras.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

20:00

Live from Toruń, Poland. Holy Mass on the Feast of St. Anthony of Padua, and the 75th Anniversary of the founding of the Parish of St. Anthony. Presided by Bishop Andrzej Suski, Bishop of Toruń.

Channels Broadcasting: TV TRWAM

Thursday 14

08:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Liturgy of Reconciliation at the 50th International Eucharistic Congress. Presided by Peter Cardinal Turkson, President of Pontifical Council for Justice and Peace

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

12:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 5th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of ‘Reconciliation in our Communion’. Speakers include Laurent Monsengwo Cardinal Pasinya, Archbishop of Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo, and Richard Moores of Children in Crossfire.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

15:00

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Holy Mass on the 5th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, from the Royal Dublin Society Arena. Presided by Seán Cardinal Brady, Archbishop of Armagh, Primate of All Ireland.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

Friday 15

07:00

K-TV Mass on the Feast of the Sacred Heart of Jesus

Channels Broadcasting Live: K-TV

09:00

Live from Tarnow, Poland. Holy Mass of Installation of Bishop Andrzeja Jeża, as Bishop of Tarnow, from the Cathedral Basilica of the Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV TRWAM

10:00

Live from Fatima, Portugal. Holy Mass on the Feast of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, from the Basilica of the Most Holy Trinity. Presided by Bishop, Titular Bishop of Gaudiaba, Military Ordinariate of Ordinariato Castrense de Portugal.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Canção Nova International

12:00

EWTN Mass on the Feast of the Sacred Heart of Jesus.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

12:50

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 6th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of ‘Communion in Suffering and Healing’. Speakers include Archbishop Bashar Matti Warda, Archbishop of Arbil (Chaldean), and Ms. Rose Busingye, Meeting Point , Kampala, Uganda. At 13:45 Recitation of the Rosary on the Annual Global Rosary Relay for Priests.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

13:30

Live from Irondale, Alabama, USA. Recitation of the Rosary on the Annual Global Rosary Relay for Priests, from the Chapel of Our Lady of the Angels.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

14:00

Live from Cologne, Germany. Holy Mass on the Feast of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, and Priestly Ordinations, from the Cathedral of Sts. Peter and Mary. Presided by Joachim Cardinal Meisner, Archbishop of Cologne.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN Katholisches

15:00

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Holy Mass and the Sacrament of the Anointing of the Sick, on the 6th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress and the Feast of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, from the Royal Dublin Society Arena. Presided by Archbishop Fouad Twal, Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

15:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Italy. Stations of the Cross, from Monte Castellano, on the 10th Anniversary of the Canonisation of Padre Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Archbishop Michele Castoro, Archbishop of Manfredonia-Vieste-San Giovanni Rotondo.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

19:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Italy. Orchestral performance entitled ‘Joannes Paulus Secundus’, on the 10th Anniversary of the Canonisation of Padre Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Saturday 16

08:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Italy. Holy Mass on the occasion of the 10th Anniversary of the Canonisation of Padre Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Tarcisio Cardinal Bertone, Secretary of State of the Vatican, Camerlengo of the Holy Roman Church.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

08:45

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Coverage of the 7th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, with theme of ‘Communion in the Word through Mary’. Speakers include Archbishop Luis Antonio Tagle, Archbishop of Manila, Philippines, and Prof. John Monaghan, Vice-President, Society of St. Vincent de Paul.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

09:00

Live from Gorzow Wielkopolski, Lubuskie, Poland. Holy Mass of Episcopal Ordination of Msgr. Tadeusz Lityński, as Titular Bishop of Cemerinianus, Auxiliary Bishop of Zielona Góra–Gorzów, from the Cathedral of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary. Principal Consecrator is Archbishop Celestino Migliore, Titular Archbishop of Canosa, and Apostolic Nuncio to Poland. With the co-consecrators Bishop Stefan Regmunt, Bishop of Zielona Gora-Gorzow; and Archbishop Andrzej Dziega, Archbishop of Szczecin-Kamien.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV TRWAM

11:00

Live from Dublin, Ireland. Holy Mass on the 6th Day of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress and the Feast of the Immaculate Heart of Mary, from the Royal Dublin Society Arena. Presided by Robert Cardinal Sarah, President of the Pontifical Council ‘Cor Unum’.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Italy. Meeting of Tarcisio Cardinal Bertone, Secretary of State of the Vatican, Camerlengo of the Holy Roman Church, with the sick of the Casa Sollievo della Sofferenza.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

18:30

Live from Lodi, Italy. Holy Mass on the occasion of Priestly Ordinations, from the Basilica Cathedral of S. Bassiano. Presided by Bishop Giuseppe Merisi, Bishop of Lodi.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace

Sunday 17

07:00

Live from Bkerké, Lebanon. Holy Mass, in the Maronite Rite, on Father’s Day, from the Bkerké Patriarchate. Presided by Patriarch Béchara Boutros Raï, Patriarch of Antioch and all The Levant (Maronite)

Channels Broadcasting Live: Noursat

08:30

Live from Zouk Mosbeh, Beirut, Lebanon. Holy Mass on the 14th Anniversary of the death of Fr. Antonios Tarabay, from the Monastery of Our Lady of Louaize.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Noursat

10:00

Papal Angelus

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, TV2000, K-TV, TV TRWAM, KTO, EWTN, TRSP

Channels Broadcasting Delayed: Padre Pio TV (11:40), KTO (11:50), Canção Nova (14:30)

11:45

Live from Dublin, Ireland. The Final Mass, Statio Orbis of the 50th International Eucharistic Congress, from Croke Park. Presided Marc Cardinal Ouellet, Prefect of the Congregation for Bishops, President of the Pontifical Commission for Latin America.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN
